sentences.en: ...fine and graphic arts.
sentences.cn: …美术与制图艺术。

sentences.en: A decision tree is a graphic model of a decision process.
sentences.cn: 决策树是描述决策过程的一种图形.

sentences.en: a graphic account of her unhappy childhood
sentences.cn: 对她不幸童年细致入微的描述

sentences.en: a graphic artist
sentences.cn: 平面造型艺术家

sentences.en: After scoring over my calmness in this graphic way he nodded wisely.
sentences.cn: 他以如此形象逼真的动作吓了我以后,便狡黠地朝我点点头.

sentences.en: Contours are graphic expressions with uniform spacing depicting a structure's character.
sentences.cn: 等高线是用等间距图解描述构造形态的.

sentences.en: Distinguish important text items in lists with graphic icons.
sentences.cn: 用图标来区分重要的文本项.

sentences.en: For a time people may change their graphic symbols to conform with changes in pronunciation.
sentences.cn: 有时人们要改变书写符号来适应发音上的变化.

sentences.en: Guo Run view of the international market - oriented brand, logo graphic elements.
sentences.cn: 鉴于国润品牌将面向国际市场, 标志图形元素.

sentences.en: His graphic art became slighter and more whimsical.
sentences.cn: 他的平面艺术变得越来越无足轻重，越来越异想天开。

sentences.en: His illness is described in graphic detail .
sentences.cn: 他的病情被描述得非常详细。

sentences.en: I could be a graphic designer , or I could be a singer.
sentences.cn: 我是做美术设计员呢, 还是歌手.

sentences.en: If you use graphic links, don't forget to use the ALT attribute.
sentences.cn: 运用图片链接时, 使用ALT标签.

sentences.en: Methods and techniques for converting data to or from graphic displays via computers.
sentences.cn: 通过计算机把数据转换为图形显示或把图形显示转换为数据的方法和技术.

sentences.en: She kept telling us about her operation, in the most graphic detail.
sentences.cn: 她一直绘声绘色地给我们讲她手术的细节.

sentences.en: The book gave a graphic description of the war.
sentences.cn: 这本书生动地描述了战争的情况.

sentences.en: the graphic arts
sentences.cn: 平面造型艺术

sentences.en: These are my skateboard graphic designs, there is more coming soon.
sentences.cn: 之前画的一些, 马上又出新的图案了.

sentences.en: We want to warn you these are graphic images of a bloody crime scene.
sentences.cn: 我们必须要警告年轻人这样的血型场面是不值得模仿的.

sentences.en: When you send an e-mail you can also send a sound or graphic file as an attachment.
sentences.cn: 在发送电子邮件时，你也可以附上一份声音或图片文件。

words.tran_cn: 生动地；活灵活现地；用图表表示；轮廓分明地
[测] 制图学；制图法；图表算法
笔迹学；笔迹相法；图表法

phrases.tran_cn: 平面艺术（含版画与刻印等）；形象艺术
平面造型设计；图示设计
图形显示；图形显示器，图形显示系统
图示均衡器；图表均衡器

trans.tran_cn: 图解的，用图表示的，用文字表示的，形象的，生动的
trans.tran_en: connected with or including drawing, printing, or designing

trans.tran_cn: 图表，图形，图画（尤指电脑荧屏或书籍、报纸上的）
